financeById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { financeById(id: $id) { amount changedby { id } created createdby { id } financeType { id } id lastchange name rbacobject { id } valid } }

financeCategoryById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { financeCategoryById(id: $id) { changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn rbacobject { id } userId { id } } }

financeCategoryPage.query: query MyQuery { financeCategoryPage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn rbacobject { id } userId { id } } }

financePage.query: query MyQuery { financePage { amount created createdby { id } financeType { id } id lastchange name valid rbacobject { id } } }

financeTypeById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { financeTypeById(id: $id) { changedby { id } created finances { id } createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn rbacobject { id } valid category { id } } }

financeTypePage.query: query MyQuery { financeTypePage { category { id } changedby { id } created createdby { id } finances { id } id lastchange name nameEn rbacobject { id } valid } }

milestoneById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { milestoneById(id: $id) { created createdby { id } enddate id lastchange name rbacobject { id } startdate valid nexts { id } previous { id } } }

milestonePage.query: query MyQuery { milestonePage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } enddate id lastchange name nexts { id } previous { id } project { id } rbacobject { id } startdate valid } }

projectById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { projectById(id: $id) { changedby { id } created createdby { id } enddate finances { id } group { id } id lastchange milestones { id } name projectType { id } rbacobject { id } startdate team { id } valid } }

projectCategoryById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { projectCategoryById(id: $id) { created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn rbacobject { id } } }

projectCategoryPage.query: query MyQuery { projectCategoryPage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn rbacobject { id } } }

projectPage.query: query MyQuery { projectPage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } enddate finances { id } group { id } id lastchange milestones { id } name projectType { id } rbacobject { id } startdate team { id } valid } }

projectTypeById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { projectTypeById(id: $id) { category { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn projects { id } rbacobject { id } valid } }

projectTypePage.query: query MyQuery { projectTypePage { category { id } changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn projects { id } rbacobject { id } valid } }

statementOfWorkById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { statementOfWorkById(id: $id) { created changedby { id } createdby { id } enddate event { id } id lastchange project { id } rbacobject { id } startdate valid } }

statementOfWorkPage.query: query MyQuery { statementOfWorkPage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } enddate event { id } id lastchange project { id } rbacobject { id } startdate valid } }

financeCategoryInsert.query: mutation MyMutation($id: UUID!, $name: String!, $name_en: String!) { financeCategoryInsert(finance: {id: $id, name: $name, nameEn: $name_en}) { id msg project { id } } }

financeCategoryUpdate.query: mutation MyMutation($id: UUID!, $name: String, $lastchange: DateTime!) { financeCategoryUpdate(finance: {id: $id, name: $name, lastchange: $lastchange}) { id msg project { lastchange id } } }

financeInsert.query: mutation MyMutation($id: UUID, $name: String!, $amount: Float, $financetype_id: UUID!, $project_id: UUID!) { financeInsert(finance: {id: $id, name: $name, amount: $amount, financetypeId: $financetype_id, projectId: $project_id, valid: true}) { id msg finance { id } } }

financeTypeInsert.query: mutation MyMutation($id: UUID!, $name: String!, $name_en: String, $category_id: UUID!) { financeTypeInsert(finance: {id: $id, name: $name, nameEn: $name_en, categoryId: $category_id}) { id msg } }

financeTypeUpdate.query: mutation MyMutation($id: UUID!, $name: String, $lastchange: DateTime!) { financeTypeUpdate(finance: {id: $id, name: $name, lastchange: $lastchange}) { id msg finance { id lastchange } } }

financeUpdate.query: mutation MyMutation($id: UUID!, $name: String!, $amount: Float, $financetype_id: UUID, $lastchange: DateTime!) { financeUpdate(finance: {id: $id, name: $name, amount: $amount, financetypeId: $financetype_id, lastchange: $lastchange}) { id msg finance { lastchange id } } }

financeCategoryDelete.query: mutation MyMutation($id: UUID!) { financeCategoryDelete(id: $id) { id msg } }
